attributes.action: During a Tier 3 lockdown, bands and musicians should be allowed to rehearse.
attributes.additional_details:
Musicians need to make a living. Retraining simply is not an option. That's like saying a politician should retrain as a shelf stacker immediately. It's stupid. Allow musicians and people in the arts to be able to safely and socially distanced, rehearse, practise, work.

The rules are far too strict and are Killing the arts.

Sort it out
attributes.background: Under tier 3 lockdown guidance that states no meeting anyone, even distanced. That means a band practises or rehearsal for musicians who NEED to rehearse and work, are impossible.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government's guidance for Tier 3 restriction includes an exception for work.  You can read more here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/tier-3-very-high-alert
https://www.gov.uk/guidance/working-safely-during-coronavirus-covid-19/performing-arts
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
